Description:
GREAT BONES!
A typical home of its era - built to last with old school building techniques and quality products that are hard to find in modern home design. Popular cream brick veneer, terracotta tiled roof, hardwood frame, polished timber floors and concrete stumps. Yes this home is arguably as solid as it was the day it was built!
This means great bones for you to retain as is, update, renovate, extend or simply put some great tenants in there making it a wise investment.
The home is positioned on a 483m2 corner lot in elevated Marshall Crescent surrounded by neat and tidy homes. It boasts a spacious lounge room on entry with mantel, gas heater, reverse-cycle split-system and polished timber floors; there is the adjacent meals area and the original but well-kept kitchen including ample cabinetry and overhead cupboards, bench-top gas hot plates and oven, double sink and a Dishlex dishwasher. To the side of the meals space is separate sunroom-come-study nook.
Three spacious bedrooms, two have built-in-robes, two have trendy corner windows and they all have polished floorboards! The family bathroom is almost original, but in great order, there's a shower, basin and separate bath.
The laundry is a good size and has a double trough; the toilet is separate.
Outside, there is the original cream brick fence, a double carport with easy parking access and lots of scope to add your own touch outside.
Position is superb, transport is handy, it is a short walk to Primary Schools, close to Kennington Village and Strath Village and five mins to Bendigo's CBD.
Be quick and take advantage of one of Kennington's most sough-after locations!
Insights: 26 Marshall Crescent, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat as a pin in a convenient locale!
Located in the heart of Kennington is this neat and tidy two bedroom townhouse offering one lucky purchaser an inner city lifestyle for themselves or their tenants that cannot be beaten!
Upon entry you are greeted by the living area of the home filled with natural light, flowing through to a kitchen and meals area made whole by a gas cooktop, Electric oven & an abundance of space. Central Heating & Wall air condition cooling are used for climate control within the property. Outside the home you will find a single roller door carport & entertaining alfresco area.
Two generous sized bedrooms occupy the home, both with Built in Robes and tucked away in the living quarters of the property. Also located in this area is a bathroom complete with bath, Laundry and separate closed door toilet.
Location plays a key role in the appeal of this home. All walks of life will find something close by to enjoy with this property with landmarks such as La Trobe University, Lake Weeroona, Bendigo CBD, Kennington Village & more a mere hop skip and jump away. 2/8 Ligar Street perfectly lends itself to first home owners, Downsizers and investors alike.

Description:
Best of the Best - 701m2 in Armitage Estate (also known as Lot 33)
Set in boutique Armitage Estate in Maiden Gully is Lot 33 also known as 36 Eden Way.
Titled and ready to be built on. It is amongst the best of the best built homes.
Fenced on two sides with BAL rating(s) available on file, minimal fuss in excavation costs, it does tick many boxes. First Home Buyers take advantage of the $20,000 FHB Grant that has been extended by both federal and state governments until mid 2021!
Measuring 701m2 so close to Balgownie Estate vineyard, Marist College, Maiden Gully Primary school, local shops and sporting facilities.
So many benefits, make the call today.
Realistic vendors wanting our feedback and your offers.

Description:
The Lifestyle Dream You Have Searched So Long For
Virtual Tour available by clicking link
Situated on a beautiful allotment of 4.925 acres overlooking a tranquil dam, coming home every night to your personal retreat will ensure that the worries of the word are left behind.
The home comprises a two-storey residence with 4 bedrooms and two living areas, one being downstairs and one upstairs.
The downstairs lounge room has a wood heater plus a reverse cycle split system air conditioner to ensure year-round comfort.
The kitchen takes advantage of the natural light filtering through and has warm slate floors welcoming guests.
The huge bathroom has a lovely claw foot bath and a separate toilet plus external door for use when enjoying the garden and yard.
Children (and parents) will love the built-in study desks upstairs allowing children the opportunity to use electronic devices with the parents still having able to monitor their online usage for security and safety.
The piece de resistance is the huge solid mud brick barn / garage with a mezzanine level for storage of use as an additional living area for children or parents to get away from everyone else separate to the main home. Use as a home office or studio for artist in you.
Not many people get the opportunity to live their dream in Mandurang Valley for under $550,000.
Today, you have the once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase at a fraction of replacement cost.
Insights: 70 Hannans Road, Mandurang South VIC 3551 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 4 bedroom house in Mandurang South have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Family Home in Desired Location
Set in the ever-popular North Bendigo locale within walking distance to Bendigo Hospital, Lake Weeroona and Bendigo CBD. This four-bedroom, two-bathroom Macquarie home was designed and built with total quality in mind.
This property features:
Four spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes and two offering walk in robe storage
Large ensuite to the master with shower, vanity, and separate toilet
Kitchen with amazing bench space, four burner gas cook-top, built in pantry, ample cupboards and drawers, electric oven, and a dishwasher
Front formal lounge plus a second open plan living room leading off the meals and kitchen area, where north facing windows capture natural light and winter sun
Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling plus two additional split system units
Main bathroom with raised feature window, shower, bath, vanity basin and separate toilet
Quality drapes, blinds, fittings, and fixtures throughout this impressive home
Double garage with direct access inside the home
Outside you will enjoy the large pergola, paved entertaining area, very private setting with well established garden beds, low maintenance landscaped side and rear yards and secure fencing on all boundaries
This is a great opportunity for an array of buyers, whether you are a first home buyer, a family looking to upsize or retire, or an investor, this golden opportunity awaits you. Contact the Heard & Co. sales team to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
WALK TO STRATH VILLAGE AND KENNINGTON RESERVOIR
This neat and tidy brick veneer home offers a fantastic opportunity to buy into a tightly-held, established neighbourhood. An easy walk to Kennington Reservoir, Strath Village, La Trobe University and primary and secondary schools, the home is ideally located for simple living.
Set back from the road, the front porch leads directly into the entrance and a spacious living and formal dining space. Beyond this room is an open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The kitchen has recently been completely renovated in a timeless style, and the dining nook offers a perfect, sunny space to eat.
At the front of the house is the large master bedroom with walk-in robe, ensuite, ceiling fan and split system. A further two bedrooms, both with built-in robes and ceiling fans, can be accessed via a hallway from both living areas. A fourth room, ideal for a home office or nursery, is also located in this space, along with a family bathroom, separate toilet and a large laundry with access to the side of the house.
Glass sliding doors from both living areas open out to a spacious alfresco area with ceiling fan, perfect for entertaining. The single garage, attached to the house and with workbench, has a door leading to the alfresco space and rear yard. Built-in garden beds, a lawn area, established trees and a courtyard offer an easy-care garden with plenty of scope. Double gates at the back of the allotment allow for vehicle access, and a large shed at the end of the garden has concrete flooring, lighting, power and built-in shelving a great home studio.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating
Split system heating and cooling throughout
Brand new kitchen including single drawer dishwasher, microwave, wall oven and four-burner electric cooktop
Shed at rear with built-in shelving, power, lights and concrete flooring
Secure access from both sides of the house to rear
Vehicle access to backyard from service road
Beautifully presented, this house is absolutely ideal for a young family seeking a home in a quality neighbourhood where they can add value and really make it their own. Alternatively, this property would also suit retirees looking for a low-maintenance lifestyle within a short walk of all amenities.
Insights: 4 Mayfield Parade, Strathdale VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 41 other 3 bedroom house in Strathdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family Home
This fabulous, stylish home situated in a quiet pocket of the popular Battunga Park Estate is sure to tick many boxes.
Comprising of 4 good sized bedrooms plus study or 5th bedroom, and two large living areas including a separate formal lounge at the front of the home, ideal for a private space to sit and relax.
Modern kitchen with stone benchtop, dishwasher, filtered water tap and overhead cupboards. The light filled family/dining area opens out to an expansive north facing pergola, making this ideal for keeping an eye on young children.
There are so many great features in this wonderful home including hardwood timber floors, 8'6 (2700mm) square set ceilings, ducted natural gas heating and evaporative cooling, and best of all loads of cupboards and storage space!
Outside is a fully landscaped block with a pitched roof deck area, established deciduous shade trees, double lock up garage with rear roller-door to yard, garden sheds and room for a caravan.
Located in a quiet area, close to bush walking tracks and local amenities, buses and only minutes to Bendigo CBD.
Call now for a private inspection.

Description:
FIRST HOME BUYERS DREAM
Positioned in a quiet court, just minutes from the schools, shops, sporting reserve and amenities of Strathfieldsaye, is this brand new GJ Gardener spec home. Happily waiting for its first owners, this house ensures that the buyer could easily take advantage of the First Home Owners grant, and zero stamp duty, without the wait involved in building their own.
A neat, landscaped front yard offers genuine side access for vehicles perfect for those with trailer, boat or caravan. The main entry opens into a hallway, and to one side is the master bedroom. Featuring a walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity, this space is filled with natural light. The remaining three bedrooms, all featuring walk-in robes, are located in a separate wing off the main living area. This area of the home also enjoys a kids lounge (or study), a family bathroom and a separate toilet.
A formal lounge towards the front of the home serves as an excellent adults retreat, and also in the front area of the house is a large and light laundry with a sliding door to the side of the home. At the end of the main hall is the light and bright open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The kitchen offers quality appliances, stone benchtops and ample storage, including a large walk-in pantry.
Glass sliding doors from the main living area open to an alfresco space with ceiling fan, lighting and power. The fully fenced rear yard is set to lawn and the level allotment means there is plenty of scope for the buyer to create their perfect garden.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Kitchen appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
Good storage throughout
Vehicle access to rear yard
Secure access from garage to home
Brand new
Absolutely ideal for a young family wanting to enter the popular Strathfieldsaye area without the wait, yet still benefit from the First Home Buyers Grant, this is a unique opportunity to walk right on in to the dream.

Surely an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Affordable Allotment
In 1851 Margaret Kennedy struck gold in the Bendigo Creek sparking the gold rush of history. Between then and 1954 more than 700,000kg of gold was discovered, representing a value of more than $30b in today's prices.
Sitting between two modern homes on Albert Street, this 682m2 allotment is positioned in the locality known as St Just Point. Named in honour of the Cornish miners who populated the area and brought their mining technology, skill and culture to Bendigo.
The allotment is fully fenced in Colorbond with gateway access to Albert Street and a 17m frontage. The site is clear of easements and restrictive covenants. It has access to all town services and is affordably priced. It's a great option for those who love the idea of a new home or investment property (subject to council approval) outside of the more densely populated housing estates. A drive along Albert Street will reveal the gentrification of the area and the modern homes that have been constructed in recent years.
Living here is living just a stroll from the Long Gully Reserve, the Water Splash Park and the Derwent Drive play space. It's a short 5 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD. Education options include close proximity to several primary schools: St Peter's PS, Lighting Reef PS and California Gully PS. While a short 3 minute drive to Maiden Gully provides great access to the highly reputed F-12 Marist College Bendigo and Maiden Gully PS. There's also great access to Long Gully IGA and Maiden Gully IGA, child care services, the Bendigo District RSL and much more.
Please call me at any time to arrange an inspection and to request a copy of the Section 32.

Address: Lot 97 McDonnell Lane Maiden Gully VIC 3551
Description:
Westbury Estate - Stage 6
Comprising of 24 lots ranging from 608m2 to 871m2. Westbury will certainly be catering to the growing family with wider, deeper lots providing plenty of space for the larger home, a shed (man cave), or a pool.
Westbury Estate, a beautifully elevated boutique estate, located on the corner of the Calder Highway & Sparrowhawk Road in Bendigo is only 5kms from the Bendigo CBD. It is within walking distance to the Bendigo Stadium and is also only 3kms from the schools and facilities of Maiden Gully and Golden Square and only 8kms from Kangaroo Flat. It really is at the heart of all of Bendigos city and outer suburbs facilities. A fabulous location for a new Villawood Community.
With a Shine Bright Early Learning and Health Hub in the centre of the community, this is the perfect spot to bring up your family. Shine Bright is a not for profit community based organisation that operates with the needs of children and families as its highest priority.

Description:
Huge Family Home In Blue Chip Strathdale Location
This huge family home sits proudly on 2 storeys and offers so much for families.
Let us start with the amazing location, just moments from the recently upgraded Crook Street Park, with huge playground and grass areas. This leads across to numerous sporting grounds, bushland reserve, & Kennington Reservoir.
By car, you are just a few minutes to the newly developed Kennington Village, with quick access to McIvor Hwy just around the corner, to direct you into town.
Before you even step inside you will appreciate the scale of this home, with double lock up garage.
Once inside the entryway gives way to 3 large bedrooms with BIR's, a sitting room and a large open plan lounge and kitchen/dining area. The ground floor offers air conditioning and a gas log fireplace.
The offering downstairs is completed by a bathroom with separate toilet and laundry.
Upstairs, offers 2 more bedrooms with BIRs, with the potential to treat the whole upstairs area as a parents retreat, with balcony overlooking the yard and pool. The area also offers bathroom with tub and separate toilet.
Just when you thought the property could not offer more, step outside to the large undercover entertainers' area with a huge swimming pool!
This property is one not to be missed!

Description:
AMAZING DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY - 2,279 sqm.
Phone Enquiry ID:46499
Residential land: $395,000
AMAZING DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY - 2,279 sqm (approx.)
At the end of a quiet court, this expansive, north-facing, half-acre block is perched at the height of Mc Ivor Hill!
Surrounded by quality, established homes on smaller, residential-sized blocks, its not hard to see why properties in this tightly-held pocket are rarely released back to the market - and are snapped up quickly when they are!
When you then consider the half-acre size of this vacant, residential allotment, this opportunity is truly, a rare commodity that is highly unlikely to present itself again.
Offering a fantastic building canvas to play with - with a wide 20m (approx.) street frontage fanning out to 58.7m (approx.) at the rear, theres a variety of possibilities for either subdivision (STCA) - or just your own dream family home; taking advantage of the wide block and northerly aspect to incorporate the design and layout you want - not just what the standard house-block usually allows.
This well established neighbourhood has all utility services available to connect - so its ready to start construction whenever you are.
But this sensational address offers a lot more than beautiful, elevated escarpments and fresh air - its less than 5km from the heart of Bendigo CBD!
Go and have a look at the block and magnificent views for yourself, you wont be disappointed.
Insights: 37 BUTTON STREET, Strathdale VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Sleek & Sophisticated in Beautiful Strathfieldsaye!
This sleek 4 bedroom family home has been designed with both style and practicality in mind. Offering several open living areas where all of the family can enjoy their own time, in their own space. On entering the home you're welcomed by the tasteful tones of quality which is displayed throughout. Fixtures, fittings, floor coverings and window furnishings all compliment this well-built home. A formal style lounge or living area would be the perfect place for parents to relax with a movie or book. The North wing accommodates children or guests with 3 adjoining bedrooms with BIR's, bathroom, toilet, laundry and a private space for reading, study, music or maybe a multipurpose room that everyone can use. With a smart design, the kitchen/dining area creates a feeling of openness whilst still compact and practical. Offering all modern conveniences that a busy family require; dishwasher, oven, walk-in pantry- with the added style of tiled splashbacks and plenty of bench space, this space really combines both aspects very well, creating real modern-day living. Step outside through the sliding doors to a magnificent decked alfresco entertaining area. With the added bonus of side-access ideal for the caravan, truck & trailer. In a tree-lined street of beautiful homes on the outskirts of Bendigo, within minutes of schools, supermarkets, medical services, sporting facilities and dining, Strathfieldsaye is the perfect place for you and your family to make a new start today!
Property Features:
- Ensuite with spa bath
- Side Access
- Dishwasher & Large Pantry
- Ducted Heating & Cooling
- Rumpus Room
- Double lock-up garage
- Outdoor Entertaining
- Land Size 1000 m2 (approx.)
- 4m x 5m Shed
